strategy: Type of strategy: centralized or federated

centralized.data_loader: Name of the data loader class : MNIST_loader, Time_series_loader
centralized.model_name: Name of the model class: Convolutional_NN, Multilayer_perceptron, Multi_RNN, Single_rnn
centralized._commentary: add some keys necessary for the data loader class

federated.data_loader: Name of the data loader class : MNIST_loader, Time_series_loader
federated.model_name: Name of the model class: Convolutional_NN, Multilayer_perceptron, Multi_RNN, Single_rnn
federated._commentary: add some keys necessary for the data loader class
